general.gigTitle: develop your wordpress website with CRM integration and email authentication

sellerCard.description:
Hi, I’m Maaz!

I’m here to help you build and manage a fully optimized and functional WordPress website tailored to your business needs. My services include:
1. Website Optimization for speed and performance.
2. Email Management with secure configurations (DMARC, SPF, DKIM)
3. DNS Records Setup for seamless operations.
4. CRM Integration for efficient business management.
5. Complete website and CRM system integration for streamlined workflows.
With my expertise, I’ll ensure your online presence is professional, efficient, and ready to support your business growth.

description.content:
Starter Package Basic WordPress Site or Landing Page


  • Custom WordPress site with essential pages (Home, About, Contact)
  • Tailored landing page with video and lead-converting forms
  • Simple email setup with domain email and email platform
  • Lead conversion form for landing page


Basic Package Optimized Multi-Step Landing Page / Funnel + CRM & Chatbot


  • SEO-optimized landing page or multi-step Effective Sales funnel to convert leads
  • CRM integration for efficient lead management
  • AI-powered chatbot to engage visitors and answer FAQs
  • Email deliverability/authentication setup for smooth communication
  • Optional WhatsApp integration for customer support


Premium Package E-commerce Store or Business Website + CRM, Email, Chatbot


  • Fully optimized e-commerce store or business website with SEO
  • Complete CRM setup for smooth customer management
  • Full email deliverability/authentication setup (DNS, hosting support)
  • AI chatbot to describe services/products and assist clients
  • WhatsApp integration for instant communication with visitors
  • Custom forms for lead generation
  • Career page with through Application process, and inquiries

slide.name: develop your wordpress website with CRM integration and email authentication
develop your wordpress website with CRM integration and email authentication
develop your wordpress website with CRM integration and email authentication

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you integrate WhatsApp with the site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, WhatsApp integration is available as an option in both the Basic and Premium Packages. This allows visitors to directly connect with you through WhatsApp for instant communication.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my site be SEO optimized?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all packages are designed to ensure your site is optimized for search engines (SEO) to help you rank better and drive more traffic to your site. Some external factors also effect it such as domains age, its reputation etc as after SEO it takes time for the site to show results

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with setting up email authentication for my domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide email authentication setup, including DNS records and hosting support, as part of the Basic and Premium Packages to ensure your domain email is fully functional and deliverable.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer post-delivery support for a limited time to ensure everything is running smoothly. For any ongoing support or maintenance, I can discuss extended service packages with you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to complete the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The delivery time depends on the complexity of the site. The Starter Package typically takes 3–5 days, the Basic Package 7–10 days, and the Premium Package 10–14 days. I will confirm a timeline once I understand the specifics of your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create custom designs based on my ideas?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can work with any designs you have in mind. If you have a Figma or Page design, I can use that as a reference to create the site exactly how you envision it.
